question: Which Union Ministry has unveiled the draft blue economy policy?
option1: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Diarying
explanation:
The Ministry of Earth Sciences (MoES) has unveiled the draft blue economy policy in the public domain, inviting suggestions and inputs from various stakeholders.
The draft policy document highlights the strategy that can be adopted by the government to utilise the oceanic resources available in the country. It also has recognised seven thematic areas.
